documentation.text: @title PoolPublic: The public pool contract. Hold all Zorro tokens deemed for public pool at inception and gradually emits to ZorroController contract based on market conditions
@notice Increases spending allowance to max amount for Zorro Controller
@title PoolPublic: The public pool contract. Hold all Zorro tokens deemed for public pool at inception and gradually emits to ZorroController contract based on market conditions
@notice Increases spending allowance to max amount for Zorro Controller

params._timelockOwner: The address of the TimelockController that should own this contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: PoolPublic: The public pool contract. Hold all Zorro tokens deemed for public pool at inception and gradually emits to ZorroController contract based on market conditions
